{"id": "14047", "title": "Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap", "description": "", "OB": "When using StyledText in word wrap mode, appending N lines to the text results in N redraws of the entire client area. This is causing inefficient redraws.", "EB": "Ideally, there should be only one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce the issue, run the test case provided below:", "SR": "- Open the application
- Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText component
- Append N lines to the text
- Observe the number of redraws and the performance impact"}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
